description:
Arctic days on the hill call for a little extra warmth. Rock this balaclava as usual, or fold it over to wear it as a mask or hood. Subtle breathing holes keep your goggles from fogging up.

  • Mask is Neofleece®: waterproof, windproof neoprene, lined with fleece for comfort against skin
  • Hood and neck section is 200-weight Polartec® fleece for cozy warmth
  • Holes around the nose and mouth let you breathe easily
name: Seirus Combo Clava Balaclava - Unisex
